title: FermiHDI License Request Reqponse Schema
description: The JSON Schema description for the response to a successful request for a license from FermiHDI

customerID.description: The Customer ID for the license being requested

licenseID.description: The ID of the license being requested

licenseFingerprint.description: The license HMAC fingerprint given by FermiHDI

licenseEncrypted.description: The Base64 encoded license encrypted using the Public Key included in the CSR

nonce.description: The Base64 encoded nonce used in the encryption of the license

dmsCRT.description: The Base64 encoded PEM formated signed Certificate for the FermiHDI HD DMS assocated with this license
